author: Steffie228
title: Nice little set
review: It is a nice little set, nicely build. I like the candy pieces a lot especially the white/red swirl piece. For kids, I think, it's a nice addition to their other lego friends sets, but on its own it lacks a little play value because it doesn't include a minifigure, but if you own one or two minifigures you're all set. the overall look is nice and simple and absolutely playable.
